subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Everything is going exactly as the N.H.L. planned, if not as it wanted. Two small-market teams are playing in late May, a time long reserved for their big-market brothers.
snippet: Everything is going exactly as the N.H.L. planned, if not as it wanted. Two small-market teams are playing in late May, a time long reserved for their big-market brothers.
